publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-191 Cathy Jamieson: Modernising Justiceâ€”That the Parliament notes the commitment made in A Partnership for a Better Scotland to working for a safer Scotland, supporting safe communities and improving public services and supports the Scottish Executive in working to modernise the courts and criminal justice system for those who have to use them, including victims and witnesses, and in delivering modern laws to deal with the complexities of modern Scottish life. Supported by: Hugh Henry*
